name: Shake Shack Inc.
description: Shake Shack Inc. is a modern-day roadside burger stand known for its high-quality, delicious food and a commitment to using fresh, premium ingredients. Founded in 2004 by Danny Meyer and his team, Shake Shack started as a food cart in New York City's Madison Square Park, serving up ShackBurgers, crinkle-cut fries, and hand-spun shakes to enthusiastic customers. Over the years, the brand has grown into a beloved global chain with locations across the United States and international markets. Shake Shack prides itself on its menu, which features a variety of items including burgers, hot dogs, chicken sandwiches, and vegetarian options, all made with 100% all-natural Angus beef, antibiotic-free chicken, and cage-free eggs. The company also emphasizes sustainability, sourcing ingredients from responsible suppliers and implementing eco-friendly practices in its operations. Shake Shack's vibrant and modern restaurant designs create a welcoming atmosphere for guests, making it a popular destination for food lovers. With a focus on community engagement and philanthropy, Shake Shack continues to expand its reach while maintaining its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Shake Shack Inc. | Quality Burgers & Fast Casual Dining
seo.meta_description: Explore Shake Shack, a modern-day roadside burger stand known for its high-quality food made from fresh ingredients. Discover our menu and locations.

faq.question: What is Shake Shack known for?
faq.answer: Shake Shack is known for its delicious burgers, hot dogs, shakes, and crinkle-cut fries made from high-quality ingredients.

faq.question: Where is Shake Shack headquartered?
faq.answer: Shake Shack is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are some popular menu items at Shake Shack?
faq.answer: Popular menu items include the ShackBurger, SmokeShack, ShroomBurger, and Crinkle-Cut Fries.
